text: Euphorbia razafindratsirae is a species of plant in the family Euphorbiaceae. It is endemic to Madagascar. Its natural habitats are subtropical or tropical dry forests and subtropical or tropical dry shrubland. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== Category:Endemic flora of Madagascar razafindratsirae Category:Critically endangered plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Euphorbia razafindratsirae
